content:
I enjoy/Ninafurahia 
 Ursula Nafula 
 English and Kiswahili 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy skiping rope. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kuruka 
 
 kamba. 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 …alone. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 …peke yangu. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy skiping it with my 
 
 friend to. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia pia kuruka na 
 
 rafiki yangu. 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy reading interesting 
 
 stories. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kusoma 
 
 hadithi zinzovutia. 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy walking in the field 
 
 with my friends. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kutembea 
 
 uwanjani na rafiki zangu. 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy washing utensils for 
 
 my mother. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kumwoshea 
 
 mama vyombo. 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy writing big leters 
 
 that I can read easily. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kuandika herufi 
 
 kubwa ninazoweza 
 
 kusoma kwa wepesi. 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy eating diferent 
 
 fruit. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kula matunda 
 
 tofauti. 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy sleping on a big 
 
 bed. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kulalia kitanda 
 
 kikubwa. 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I enjoy listening to mother 
 
 teling interesting stories. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ninafurahia kumsikiliza 
 
 mama akisimulia hadithi za 
 
 kuvutia. 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ooh! I enjoy doing al these 
 
 things! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Aah! Ninafurahia kufanya 
 
 hivi vyote. 
 
 
 
 
 
 1
